text: What this government, what Fujimorism did.
If he did not want to see the Peruvian mothers,
It would have been better that he terminated us,
so that we wouldn’t have to live in this situation
Us mothers will be even more dragged
This damned government, what he did.
Now if he is asking for...
as for me I hope he dries up in prison.
As he let so many people incapacitated here,
That is the testimony I give you now.
